languages.text: "Не помню. Тьма. Меня куда-то волокли. Я позвал Глейто и получил удар, а потом вспомнил..." {n}Соломон дрожащей рукой сжимает холку Глейто.{/n} "Вспомнил западню. И я дрался, не чувствуя боли и страха — только ярость. Пришел себя в другом месте и искал, искал, искал..."

"I don't remember. It was dark. I was being dragged somewhere. I called Glaito and I was struck, and then..." {n}Solomorne grips the back of Glaito's neck with a trembling hand.{/n} "I remembered the trap. And I started fighting. I felt no pain or fear, only rage. I came to in a different place and I searched, and searched, and searched..."
languages.original_text: "Не помню. Тьма. Меня куда-то волокли. Я позвал Глейто и получил удар, а потом вспомнил..." {n}Соломон дрожащей рукой сжимает холку Глейто.{/n} "Вспомнил западню. И я дрался, не чувствуя боли и страха — только ярость. Пришел себя в другом месте и искал, искал, искал..."

traits.locale_text: "I don't remember. It was dark. I was being dragged somewhere. I called Glaito and I was struck, and then..." {n}Solomorne grips the back of Glaito's neck with a trembling hand.{/n} "There was an ambush. And I fought. I felt no pain or fear, only rage. I came to in a different place and I searched, and searched, and searched..."

I came to in a different place and I searched, and searched, and searched..."

I felt no pain or fear, only rage. I came to in a different place and I searched, and searched, and searched..."

I felt no pain or fear, only rage. I came to in a different place and I searched, and searched, and searched..."

languages.text: 「覚えてない。暗闇だった。どこかへ引きずられていった。グライトを呼んだけど、殴られて、それから…」{n}ソロモーンは震える手でグライトの首筋をつかんだ。{/n}「罠のことを思い出した。戦闘を始めた。痛みも恐怖も感じず、ただ怒りだけだった。気がつくと別の場所にいて、ひたすら捜索して、捜索して、捜索し続けてた…」
languages.original_text: "I don't remember. It was dark. I was being dragged somewhere. I called Glaito and I was struck, and then..." {n}Solomorne grips the back of Glaito's neck with a trembling hand.{/n} "I remembered the trap. And I started fighting. I felt no pain or fear, only rage. I came to in a different place and I searched, and searched, and searched..."

traits.locale_text: 「覚えてない。暗闇だった。どこかへ引きずられていった。グライトを呼んだけど、殴られて、それから…」{n}ソロモーンは震える手でグライトの首筋をつかんだ。{/n}「罠のことを思い出した。戦闘を始めた。痛みも恐怖も感じず、ただ怒りだけだった。気がつくと別の場所にいて、ひたすら捜索して、捜索して、捜索し続けてた…」

languages.text: "Ich erinnere mich nicht. Es war dunkel. Ich würde irgendwo hingeschleppt. Ich rief Glaito, wurde niedergestreckt und dann ..." {n}Solomorne umschließt mit zitternder Hand Glaitos Nacken.{/n} "Ich erinnerte mich an die Falle. Und ich begann zu kämpfen. Ich spürte weder Schmerz noch Furcht, nur Zorn. An einem anderen Ort kam ich wieder zu Bewusstsein und suchte und suchte und suchte ..."
languages.original_text: "I don't remember. It was dark. I was being dragged somewhere. I called Glaito and I was struck, and then..." {n}Solomorne grips the back of Glaito's neck with a trembling hand.{/n} "I remembered the trap. And I started fighting. I felt no pain or fear, only rage. I came to in a different place and I searched, and searched, and searched..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich erinnere mich nicht. Es war dunkel. Ich würde irgendwo hingeschleppt. Ich rief Glaito, wurde niedergestreckt und dann ..." {n}Solomorne umschließt mit zitternder Hand Glaitos Nacken.{/n} "Ich erinnerte mich an die Falle. Und ich begann zu kämpfen. Ich spürte weder Schmerz noch Furcht, nur Zorn. An einem anderen Ort kam ich wieder zu Bewusstsein und suchte und suchte und suchte ..."

languages.text: « Je ne me souviens pas. J'étais dans l'obscurité. On me traînait quelque part. J'ai appelé Glaito, on m'a frappé en retour, et... {n}Solomorne pose une main tremblante sur la nuque du cyber-mastiff.{/n} Je me suis souvenu du piège. Et j'ai commencé à me battre. Je ne ressentais ni peur ni douleur, uniquement de la rage. Je me suis rendu dans un autre endroit, et j'ai cherché, cherché, cherché... »
languages.original_text: "I don't remember. It was dark. I was being dragged somewhere. I called Glaito and I was struck, and then..." {n}Solomorne grips the back of Glaito's neck with a trembling hand.{/n} "I remembered the trap. And I started fighting. I felt no pain or fear, only rage. I came to in a different place and I searched, and searched, and searched..."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne me souviens pas. J'étais dans l'obscurité. On me traînait quelque part. J'ai appelé Glaito, on m'a frappé en retour, et... {n}Solomorne pose une main tremblante sur la nuque du cyber-mastiff.{/n} Je me suis souvenu du piège. Et j'ai commencé à me battre. Je ne ressentais ni peur ni douleur, uniquement de la rage. Je me suis rendu dans un autre endroit, et j'ai cherché, cherché, cherché... »

languages.text: «No lo recuerdo. Estaba oscuro. Me arrastraban a alguna parte. Llamé a Glaito y me golpearon, y luego...». {n}Solomorne pone una mano temblorosa sobre el pescuezo de Glaito.{/n} «Recuerdo la trampa. Y opuse resistencia. No sentía dolor ni miedo, solo rabia. Llegué a otro sitio distinto y busqué, busqué y busqué...».
languages.original_text: "I don't remember. It was dark. I was being dragged somewhere. I called Glaito and I was struck, and then..." {n}Solomorne grips the back of Glaito's neck with a trembling hand.{/n} "I remembered the trap. And I started fighting. I felt no pain or fear, only rage. I came to in a different place and I searched, and searched, and searched..."

traits.locale_text: «No lo recuerdo. Estaba oscuro. Me arrastraban a alguna parte. Llamé a Glaito y me golpearon, y luego...». {n}Solomorne pone una mano temblorosa sobre el pescuezo de Glaito.{/n} «Recuerdo la trampa. Y opuse resistencia. No sentía dolor ni miedo, solo rabia. Llegué a otro sitio distinto y busqué, busqué y busqué...».

languages.text: “我不记得了。当时一片漆黑，我被拖到了某个地方。我喊着格雷托的名字，之后被人打了一顿。再后来……”{n}索罗蒙伸出了颤抖的手，紧紧握住了格雷托的后颈。{/n}“我回想起了那个陷阱，于是我开始拼命反击。我的心里没有任何痛苦、恐惧，只有愤怒。后来，我去了另一个地方，开始找，一直在找，一刻不停地找……”
languages.original_text: "I don't remember. It was dark. I was being dragged somewhere. I called Glaito and I was struck, and then..." {n}Solomorne grips the back of Glaito's neck with a trembling hand.{/n} "I remembered the trap. And I started fighting. I felt no pain or fear, only rage. I came to in a different place and I searched, and searched, and searched..."

traits.locale_text: “我不记得了。当时一片漆黑，我被拖到了某个地方。我喊着格雷托的名字，之后被人打了一顿。再后来……”{n}索罗蒙伸出了颤抖的手，紧紧握住了格雷托的后颈。{/n}“我回想起了那个陷阱，于是我开始拼命反击。我的心里没有任何痛苦、恐惧，只有愤怒。后来，我去了另一个地方，开始找，一直在找，一刻不停地找……”

languages.text: "Hatırlamıyorum. Etraf karanlıktı. Sürükleyerek bir yere götürdüler. Glaito'ya seslenince bana saldırdılar, sonrasında da..."{n}Solomorne, titrek eliyle Glaito'yu ensesinden tutuyor.{/n} "Tuzağı hatırladım ve karşılık vermeye başladım. Ne acı ne de korku... Tek hissettiğim öfkeydi. Kendime geldiğimdeyse bambaşka bir yerdeydim ve aramaya koyuldum. Aradım da aradım."
languages.original_text: "I don't remember. It was dark. I was being dragged somewhere. I called Glaito and I was struck, and then..." {n}Solomorne grips the back of Glaito's neck with a trembling hand.{/n} "I remembered the trap. And I started fighting. I felt no pain or fear, only rage. I came to in a different place and I searched, and searched, and searched..."

traits.locale_text: "Hatırlamıyorum. Etraf karanlıktı. Sürükleyerek bir yere götürdüler. Glaito'ya seslenince bana saldırdılar, sonrasında da..."{n}Solomorne, titrek eliyle Glaito'yu ensesinden tutar.{/n} "Tuzağı hatırladım ve karşılık vermeye başladım. Ne acı ne de korku... Tek hissettiğim öfkeydi. Kendime geldiğimdeyse bambaşka bir yerdeydim ve aramaya koyuldum. Aradım da aradım.
